item.title: Don’t use Git to Deploy Code
item.description: Just don’t. If you can’t reason why, please stop developing code critical to your business. When it works, it works Git is great. Push here, pull there. It works so well that you might be fatuously convinced it’s the perfect tool to deploy production code. Even worse, it might appear to work well at this task, further reinforcing your choice However, the Achilles Heel of any DVCS is your origin provider.
